name: Barkhan
description:
A harsh sand planet has become the stage for a brutal war between three Great Clans.

For the power over rare minerals each wants to prove their superiority.

The Clan of Power relies on the power of its heavy armored vehicles.

The Clan of Will relies on speed and precision, making them deadly opponents.

The Clan of Trickery relies on high-tech solutions: plasma weapons, aviation, combat drones and stealth technology.

In the heat of dynamic battles with the enemy's troops, be prepared to face and attack giant Sand Snakes and find the mysteries lurking in the sands.
